ygData.subject: Re: Spell components
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all, you mean research components, not spell components.  They are book pages, and can be found anywhere the other magic classes research components
ygData.messageBody:
First of all, you mean research components, not spell components. They are
book pages, and can be found anywhere the other magic classes research
components are found, ie as loot on critters. As to which critters,
confirmed sightings are
Unrest monsters
goblin warriors

There are others im sure, but these are ones I know of.

-----Original Message-----
From: duffjc@... [mailto:duffjc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 2:39 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Spell components


From: duffjc@...

Please forgive my ignorance if this topic was alread covered but, has anyone
foound where to get the spell components for an enchanter. I think they are
words or something?

Thanks,

Duff

An interest in all things Arcane.
